name: Raquel Torres
text: Quick and quaint, even on a Saturday night. Good customer service. The gentleman forgot a topping on our pizza but it was great otherwise. The ingredients seem pretty fresh too.

name: reina clark
text: To be honest, so happy how fresh the ingredients are. Pizza was hot and delicious. Our new favorite place that delivers. I highly recommend. I give 5 stars.

name: Janelle Burnette
text: Ordered pizza online for lunch and had it delivered to the vet school.  They were prompt (pizza arrived sooner than was expected), and the driver was friendly and courteous.  Of course the pizza was yummy, too!

name: Cara Manville
text: After having a bad experience at the Leesville location (which is now permanently closed), the owner of this location reached out to us to rectify the situation. I'm impressed by the level of customer service the gesture demonstrates and I …More

name: Adam Socha
text: I have made a few time sensitive orders and never have had an issue. I usually talk to the manager the day before. Give them the number of pizzas and the location, and they have yet to let me down. The pizzas have been great. Every time I …More

name: Nikyle Hooker
text: My first impression will be a lasting one. Right on time just my type of place open late for late night munchies. Any of you late night munchers want some good munchies go to Marco's Pizza

name: Rusty Gat.
text: I asked what the special was and got placed on hold for 5 minutes. Then I got hung up on. After calling back I was immediately hung up on. It's a shame that nice young lady isn't working the phones/register. Seriously think about her working peak hours...otherwise your service is garbage!

name: Melissa Wiese
text: Love their delxue Uno pizza and their brownies.  So good!

name: Sadie Hoke
text: This place is pretty good. The manager or owner is nice too.

name: Josh E
text: I used to go to a roller skating ring as a child back in cny that had better pizza than this place. Idk where this guy below got his pizza in Buffalo but he needs his head examined. If Google allowed me to leave my number I would so I could talk to you before you make a huge mistake.

name: Lorraine Henderson
text: This is terrible. I order a pizza and it didn't come until an hour and thirty minutes later. I would called after an hour and they told me ten minutes and it really took thirty. Don't come here if you're really hungry and want food.

name: Paul Naderman
text: Great pizza and good,  great group of guys and awesome customer service...

name: baby mee
text:
this place never disappoints!!
one of the best pizza places in town

name: Kenya Sanders
text: I made an order at 10:33 I called at 11:13 to check on the status of my order the lady said my order was out for delivery. About 15mins went by I checked my order online and it said the status of my order was changed at 10:48 to "order …More

name: Bridget Harrison
text: I tried to order at 2 am  and they said they were open to 3 but didn't answer my call. Very unprofessional. Wish I ordered dominos. Jk did order from dominos. Vety professional.

name: Keisha Teasley
text: One of my favorite pizza places.

name: James Hinton
text: No one answering nd it 40mins b4 close im contacting corporate asap..

name: Joelle Cirimele
text: Besides the great food this location is also great with customer service. Only Pizza place we order from.

name: Ryan M
text: I'm from Buffalo, NY and this is the ONLY pizza in NC that I get down with. The Old World pepperoni is what's up.

name: Curt Frederick
text: Love their pizza. Wish I still lived next door

name: Patrick Connelly
text: This is one of my favorite take out pizza place. The Roma crust is what makes it!

name: Valerie Stanberry
text: The service was great

name: Jennifer Manning
text: A sleepover and family favorite. Sometimes the subs are too well toasted but it does not stop us from returning.

name: Venkata Rohith Reddy Matli
text: Crust toppings are awesome

name: shanita perry
text: Love the hot wings

name: Arminda De Hoyos
text: The pizza is delicious

name: Pam Leubner
text: Pure deliciousness!!!

name: Cathy Jacob
text: Great
